name: Jigsaw Puzzle Fever
description:
Jigsaw Puzzle Fever is a single player game that is fun for all the family. Pick one of the ten starting puzzles to get on your way.

Each puzzle can be played in one of four difficulty levels:
- 48 pieces
- 48 pieces with rotated pieces
- 108 pieces
- 108 pieces with rotated pieces

The pieces are laid out on the screen - the player simply scrolls through the available pieces
and selects a piece.

Puzzles offer one or more additional features for the player to use:
GRID - Show the grid of the puzzle pieces.
EDGES - Filter the pieces to show only the edge pieces.
HELP – Automatically place one piece in the correct position.
PEEK - Show the full picture.

Some of the puzzles have forced difficulty settings (e.g. no hints, timer, no peeking).

Levels
Puzzles are grouped into levels. Once all of the initial 10 puzzles have been completed, the
next level unlocks. There are 75 puzzles in total.

Trophies
The game will feature trophies which the user can collect by completing various challenges.

Leaderboards
The game will include leaderboards to allow players to post scores with their friends and the rest of the world.
